name: MERII JAAN YUSRAAAAAA
wishText: HAPPY VALENTINES DAY MY LOVEEEE YOU ARE THE BEST THING  THAT EVER HAPPENED TO ME IM SO PROUD OF YOU YOU ARE THE BEST PERSON IN MY LIFE,  EVERYTHING ABOUT YOU IS PERFECT, YOUR HEART YOUR SMILE ITS JUST UAHHHH IM SO LUCKY TO HAVE YOU MERI JAAN,Happy Valetines Day Meri Jaan <3 I am so lucky to have you, you are the best thing that ever happened to me, iknow i am not the greatest bf or the easiest bf to handle but trust me I really try to be the one for you, mera pyaara sa bacha mera sab kuch i can't thank enough for you, everything about you is the best yk, your smile your eyes and your heart i am too lucky to be yours and im just proud ke i have someone like you who i won't ever judge me. I am happy I HAVE SOMEONE LIKE YOU<3 ILOVEYOUSOOOMUCHHHHHHH SO MANY KISSES. HONESTLY SEEING YOU MAKES ME WANT TO BITE YOUR CHUBBY CHEEKS CAN'T WAITTTT.SO FOR 14TH FEB I HAVE LISTED DOWN SOME THINGS THINGS I LOVE ABOUT YOU 1:YOUR EYES, YOUR SMILE, YOUR CHUBBY CHEEKS, YOUR FRICKING LIPS, YOUR PYAARAY PYAARAY HAIRS,YOUR KIND HEART, YOUR VOICE, YOUR SOFTONE WHEN YOU ARE TALING TO ME, YOUR GENIUS BRAIN WHICH WORKS LIKE MACHINE , YOUR PRETTY PRETTY NAILS AND lastly you as in whole ;) and honorable mentions YK THATTTT YES THAT!!!!;)) ILOVEYOUSOOOMUCHHHH <3
